import React from 'react' import Chart from '../components/company/Chart' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Statistics from '../components/company/Statistics' import Industry from '../components/company/Industry' class CompanyContainer extends React.Component { state = { chart: false } chartFinished = () => { this.setState({chart: true}) } render() { return (

Company Container

{this.props.data.name} ({this.props.data.ticker})
Need to add latest stock price
Add to watchlist button
Latest Stock Statistics
< Statistics data={this.props.data} />
Company Info
< Industry data={this.props.data} />

Chart goes here - add chart title and company name

< Chart chartFinished={this.chartFinished} chart={this.props.data.charts[0]} /> ) } } const mapStateToProps = state => { // console.log('state in companycontainer:', state) return {data: state.companies} } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CompanyContainer)
